TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListControl

summary.span: 表示用于显示项列表的 Windows 控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows control to display a list of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件允许您向用户显示项列表，用户可通过单击来选择这些项。The control enables you to display a list of items to the user that the user can select by clicking. 控件可以使用属性提供单个或多个选择 。A control can provide single or multiple selections using the property. 还提供了 属性以允许在列中显示项，而不是项的垂直垂直列表。The also provides the property to enable the display of items in columns instead of a straight vertical list of items. 这样，控件可以显示更多可见项，用户不再需要滚动到项。With this, the control can display more visible items and the user no longer needs to scroll to an item. 通常，Windows 会处理绘制要在中显示的项的任务 。Typically, Windows handles the task of drawing the items to display in the . 您可以使用 属性，并处理 和事件， 以便您可以重写 Windows 提供的自动绘制和自己绘制项。You can use the property, and handle the and events so you can override the automatic drawing that Windows provides and draw the items yourself. 您可以使用所有者描述的 控件为列表中每一项的文本显示可变高度项、图像或不同的颜色或字体。You can use owner-drawn controls to display variable-height items, images, or a different color or font for the text of each item in the list. 属性 和 也有助于您绘制自己的项。The property, , and also help you draw your own items. 除了显示和选择功能 外，还提供了一些功能，使您能够有效地将项添加到 和以在列表的项中查找文本。In addition to display and selection functionality, the also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the and to find text within the items of the list. 使用 和 方法可以向中添加大量项， 而无需在每次向列表中添加项时重新绘制控件。The and methods enable you to add a large number of items to the without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list. 使用 和 方法可以搜索列表中包含特定搜索字符串的项。The and methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string. 、 和 属性提供对使用的三个集合的访问 。The , , and properties provide access to the three collections that are used by the . 下表概述了在控件中使用的三个集合 。The following table outlines the three collections used by the and their use within the control. |集合类Collection class|在 Use within the | |----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||包含控件中包含的所有项 。Contains all items contained in the control.| ||包含选定项的集合，这些项是控件中包含的项的子集 。Contains a collection of the selected items which is a subset of the items contained in the control.| ||包含所选索引的集合，这些索引是的索引的子集 。Contains a collection of the selected indexes, which is a subset of the indexes of the . 这些索引指定选定的项。These indexes specify items that are selected.| 以下三个示例显示了类支持的三个索引集合 。The following three examples show the three indexed collections that the class supports. 下表显示了一个示例，说明如何在 示例中存储的项以及 其选择状态 。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection state within an example . |索引Index|ItemItem|列表框中的选择状态Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |00|object1object1|未选定Unselected| |11|b jobject2|选定Selected| |22|object3object3|未选定Unselected| |33|object4object4|选定Selected| |44|object5object5|选定Selected| 根据 上表中所示，下表显示了 会出现的情况。Based on the shown in the previous table, this table shows how the would appear. |索引Index|ItemItem| |-----------|----------| |00|b jobject2| |11|object4object4| |22|object5object5| 根据 上表中所示，下表显示了 会出现的情况。Based on the shown in the previous table, this table shows how the would appear. |索引Index|项的索引Index of item| |-----------|-------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 类的方法可用于向中 添加项 。The method of the class enables you to add items to the . 向添加成员时，该方法可接受任何对象 。The method can accept any object when adding a member to the . 将对象添加到时 ，控件将使用对象的方法中定义的文本， 除非在属性中指定了对象中的成员名称 。When an object is being added to the , the control uses the text defined in the method of the object unless a member name within the object is specified in the property. 除了使用类的方法添加项 外，还可以使用类的属性添加项 。In addition to adding items using the method of the class you can also add items using the property of the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果 基本 windows 窗体上有、或，并且想要修改派生的 windows 窗体中这些控件的字符串集合，则基本 windows 窗体中这些控件的字符串集合必须为空。If you have a , , or on a base Windows form and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived Windows form, the string collections of those controls in the base Windows form must be empty. 如果字符串集合不为空，则当您派生另一个 Windows 窗体时，它们将变为只读。If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another Windows form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件在列中显示多个项，并且可以在控件的列表中选择多个项。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list. 示例的代码使用类的方法将50项添加到， 然后使用方法从列表中选择三项 。The code for the example adds 50 items to the using the method of the class and then selects three items from the list using the method. 然后，该代码通过属性显示集合中的值 ，通过属性显示这些值 。The code then displays values from the collection, through the property, and the , through the property. 此示例要求代码位于中，并从调用 。This example requires that the code is located in and called from a . summary.span: 当向 中一次添加一个项时，通过防止该控件绘图来维护性能，直到调用 方法为止。

span.span: Maintains performance while items are added to the one at a time by preventing the control from drawing until the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向添加多个项的首选方法 是使用 类的方法 (通过 ) 的属性 。The preferred way to add multiple items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 这使您可以在单个操作中将一组项添加到列表中。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 但是，如果你想要使用类的方法一次添加一个项 ，则可以使用 方法防止 每次向列表中添加项时重新绘制控件。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成向列表中添加项的任务后，调用 方法以使 能够重绘。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 当向列表中添加大量项时，这种添加项的方法可能会阻止 flickered 的绘制。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 和 方法，同时将5000项添加到 。The following code example uses the and methods while adding five thousand items to a . 此示例需要已将 名为的控件 `listBox1` 添加到，并将 此方法放置在窗体中并从其调用。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a and that this method is placed within the form and called from it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法等效于将属性设置 为负一 (-1) 。Calling this method is equivalent to setting the property to negative one (-1). 您可以使用此方法快速取消选择列表中的所有项。You can use this method to quickly unselect all items in the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与属性结合使用， 以将当前选定的项移动到的显示区域中项列表的顶部 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 该示例还演示了如何使用类的方法删除项 ，以及如何使用方法清除所有项选择 。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 代码首先将中的当前选定项移动 到列表的顶部。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 然后，该代码移除当前选定项之前的所有项，并清除中的所有选择 。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 此示例要求将 包含项添加到窗体中，并且当前在中选择了某个项 。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the . span.span: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由所有者描述的使用 。This event is used by an owner-drawn . 仅当 属性设置为或时才引发事件 `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed` `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable` 。The event is only raised when the property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed` or `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`. 可以使用此事件执行在中绘制项所需的任务 。You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the . 如果将属性设置为) ，则在绘制项之前，如果具有可变大小的项 (，则 `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable` 会引发事件。If you have a variable-sized item (when the property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`), before drawing an item, the event is raised. 可以为事件创建事件处理程序 ，以指定要在事件的事件处理程序中绘制的项的大小 。You can create an event handler for the event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建所有者描述的 项。The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用 属性来指定所绘制的项是固定大小的，以及 用于执行每个项到中的绘制的事件 。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 示例代码使用 作为参数传递给事件处理程序的类的属性和方法来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例要求已将 名为的控件 `listBox1` 添加到窗体，并且该 事件由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序进行处理。This example requires that a control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还要求 使用文本 "Apple"、"橙色" 和 "Plum" 将项添加到中。The example also requires that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向添加项的首选方法 是使用 类的方法 (通过 ) 的属性 。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 这使您可以一次向列表中添加一组项。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 但是，如果你想要使用类的方法一次添加一个项 ，则可以使用 方法防止 每次向列表中添加项时重新绘制控件。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成向列表中添加项的任务后，调用 方法以使 能够重绘。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 当向列表中添加大量项时，这种添加项的方法可能会阻止 flickered 的绘制。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 和 方法，同时将5000项添加到 。The following code example uses the and methods while adding five thousand items to a . 此示例需要已将 名为的控件 `listBox1` 添加到，并将 此方法放置在窗体中并从其调用。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a and that this method is placed within the form and called from it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. 搜索将查找与指定的搜索字符串参数部分匹配的单词 `s` 。The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`. 您可以使用此方法搜索与指定字符串匹配的第一项。You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string. 然后，可以使用 方法或更改项的文本，执行删除包含搜索文本的项等任务。You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the method or changing the item's text. 找到指定的文本后，如果要在中搜索文本的其他实例 ，则可以使用提供参数的方法的版本来 指定中的起始索引 。Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the , you can use the version of the method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the . 如果希望搜索完全匹配的单词而不是部分匹配项，请使用 方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法在中搜索字符串的第一个实例 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to search for the first instance of a string in a . 如果找不到与搜索字符串匹配的项，则 返回-1 值，该示例显示 。If no items are found that match the search string returns a -1 value and the example displays a . 如果找到与搜索文本匹配的项，则此示例将使用 方法来选择中的项 。If an item is found that matches the search text, the example uses the method to select the item in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. 搜索将查找与指定的搜索字符串参数部分匹配的单词 `s` 。The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`. 您可以使用此方法在的项的列表中搜索与指定字符串匹配的第一项 。You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string at the specified starting index within the list of items for the . 然后，可以使用 方法或更改项的文本，执行删除包含搜索文本的项等任务。You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the method or changing the item's text. 此方法通常在使用未指定起始索引的此方法的版本进行调用之后使用。This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index. 如果在列表中找到了初始项，则此方法通常用于通过在 `startIndex` 搜索文本的第一个找到实例之后指定该项的参数中的索引位置来查找更多的搜索文本实例。Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text. 如果希望搜索完全匹配的单词而不是部分匹配项，请使用 方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 当搜索到达的底部时 ，它将继续从 返回到参数所指定的项的顶部进行搜索 `startIndex` 。When the search reaches the bottom of the , it continues searching from the top of the back to the item specified by the `startIndex` parameter. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当属性设置为时，此属性才会报告有用值 `true` 。This property only reports a useful value if the property is set to `true`. 如果的宽度小于 此属性的值，水平滚动条将水平滚动中的项 。If the width of the is smaller than the value of this property, the horizontal scroll bar horizontally scrolls items in the . 如果的宽度 等于或大于此值，则会隐藏水平滚动条。If the width of the is equal to or greater than this value, the horizontal scroll bar is hidden. 此属性的值不由动态更新 。The value of this property is not dynamically updated by the . 当的项是所有者描述的项时，此属性很有用 。This property is useful when the items of the are owner-drawn. 例如，如果的所有者绘制的项的 宽度为200像素，但 为60像素宽，则 需要将属性设置为200，以便将项的右边缘滚动到控件的可见区域。For example, if the owner drawn items of the are 200 pixels wide, but the is 60 pixels wide, the property would need to be set to 200 in order to scroll the right edge of the items into the visible region of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 属性来显示水平滚动条，其中显示了控件中的所有项文本 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the control. 该示例还使用 属性来确保由于控件大小而不会部分显示项 。The example also uses the property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the control. 此示例要求已将 名为的控件 `listBox1` 添加到窗体中。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定在中的 项的宽度 超出控件的右边缘时是否应显示水平滚动条。The property determines whether the should display a horizontal scroll bar when the width of items within the extend beyond the right edge of the control. 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，滚动条将根据中项的宽度自动显示 。When this property is set to `true`, the scroll bar is automatically displayed based on the width of items in the . 如果 是所有者描述的，则 必须设置属性，才能正确显示水平滚动条 。If the is an owner-drawn , in order to properly display a horizontal scroll bar, you must set the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 属性来显示水平滚动条，其中显示了控件中的所有项文本 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the control. 该示例还使用 属性来确保由于控件大小而不会部分显示项 。The example also uses the property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the control. 此示例要求已将 名为的控件 `listBox1` 添加到窗体中。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够确定哪个项位于控件中的特定位置。This method enables you to determine which item is located at a specific location within the control. 用户右键单击时，可以使用此方法来确定列表中的哪一项处于选定状态 。You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the . 可以确定游标的位置，并将其传递给 `p` 方法的参数 ，以确定用户鼠标右键单击的项。The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `p` parameter of the method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over. 然后，您可以向用户显示一个快捷菜单，以提供基于特定项的任务和功能。You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 包含要放置到控件中的项的控件执行拖放操作 。The following code example demonstrates how to perform drag-and-drop operations using a control that contains items to drop into a control. 窗体的构造函数将属性设置为，以便 `true` 在中执行拖放操作 。The constructor of the form sets the property to `true` to enable drag-and-drop operations to occur in the . 该示例 通过调用方法，使用的事件 来启动拖动操作 。The example uses the event of the to start the drag operation by calling the method. 该示例使用 事件确定要拖动到的项 是否为有效的数据类型。The example uses the event to determine if an item being dragged into the is a valid data type. 事件执行拖动的项到实际放控件中的当前光标位置在。The event performs the actual dropping of a dragged item into the control at the current cursor location within the . 此示例要求 和事件已 连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that the and events have been connected to the event handlers defined in the example. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否应调整大小以避免只显示项的局部。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should resize to avoid showing partial items.

value.span: 如果该控件调整大小以便不显示不完整的项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control resizes so that it does not display partial items; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，控件将自动调整大小以确保某个项未部分显示。When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed. 如果要根据窗体的空间要求来维护的原始大小 ，请将此属性设置为 `false` 。If you want to maintain the original size of the based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`. 默认情况下， 和 大小为，它们只显示整个项。By default, the and the sizes are such that they show only whole items. 如果希望 或 完全填充停靠区域，请将设置 为 `false` 。If you want the or to completely fill a docked area, set to `false`. 这将导致控件完全填充区域，但不会完全显示最后一项。This causes the control to completely fill the area, but the last item is not fully displayed. 如果不 包含任何项，则此属性不起作用。If the does not contain any items, this property has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 整数高度基于的高度 ，而不是客户端区域的高度。The integral height is based on the height of the , rather than the client area height. 因此，在 设置该属性时 `true` ，如果显示滚动条，则仍可以部分显示项。As a result, when the property is set `true`, items can still be partially shown if scroll bars are displayed. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 属性设置为 `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable` ，则此属性不起作用。If the property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, this property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 属性来显示水平滚动条，其中显示了控件中的所有项文本 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the control. 该示例还使用 属性来确保由于控件大小而不会部分显示项 。The example also uses the property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the control. 此示例要求已将 名为的控件 `listBox1` 添加到窗体中。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可让你获取对当前存储在中的项列表的引用 。This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the . 通过此引用，你可以添加项、移除项以及获取集合中项的计数。With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection. 有关可通过项集合执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅 类参考主题。For more information about the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the class reference topics. 你还可以使用属性操作的项 。You can also manipulate the items of a by using the property. 如果使用属性向 添加项 ，则可以使用属性查看中的项， 但不能使用的方法在列表中添加或移除项 。If you use the property to add items to a , you can view the items in the using the property but you cannot add or remove items from the list using the methods of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件在列中显示多个项，并且可以在控件的列表中选择多个项。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list. 示例的代码使用类的方法将50项添加到， 然后使用方法从列表中选择三项 。The code for the example adds 50 items to the using the method of the class and then selects three items from the list using the method. 然后，该代码将 通过 属性) 和 (属性) 显示集合 (的值 。The code then displays values from the collection (through the property) and the (through the property). 此示例要求代码位于中，并从调用 。This example requires that the code is located in and called from a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以为此事件创建事件处理程序，以便在事件中绘制项之前指定项的大小 。You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size an item will be made before it is drawn in the event. 仅当属性设置为时才引发事件 。The event is only raised when the property is set to . 项的最大有效高度 为255像素。The maximum valid height of a item is 255 pixels. 当处理此事件时，将的属性设置为大于255的值可能会产生意外的结果。Setting the property of the to a value greater than 255 when handling this event may yield unexpected results. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 如何通过将 属性设置为 并处理 和 事件来绘制所有者。The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn by setting the property to and handling the and events. 它还演示如何设置 和 属性以及如何使用 方法。It also demonstrates setting the and properties and using the method. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到导入 命名空间和命名空间的空窗体中 。To run this example, paste it in an empty form that imports the namespace and the namespace. `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用。Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还使派生类可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建所有者描述的 项。The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用 属性来指定所绘制的项是固定大小的，以及 用于执行每个项到中的绘制的事件 。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 示例代码使用 作为参数传递给事件处理程序的类的属性和方法来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例要求已将 名为的控件 `listBox1` 添加到窗体，并且该 事件由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序进行处理。This example requires that a control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还要求 使用文本 "Apple"、"橙色" 和 "Plum" 将项添加到中。The example also requires that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否始终显示垂直滚动条，即使中的项目数 不需要显示垂直滚动条也是如此。The property indicates whether a vertical scroll bar is always displayed, even if the number of items in the does not require displaying the vertical scroll bar. 默认情况下， 仅当有足够的项来保证显示时，才会显示垂直滚动条。By default, a only shows a vertical scroll bar when there are enough items to warrant displaying. 对于多列 ，该 属性指示显示水平滚动条。For a multicolumn , the property indicates that a horizontal scroll bar is displayed. 无论多列的此属性的值如何，都不会显示垂直滚动条 。A vertical scroll bar is never displayed regardless of the value of this property for a multicolumn . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何 通过将 属性设置为 `OwnerDrawVariable` 值并处理 和 事件来描述所有者。The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn by setting the property to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value and handling the and events. 它还演示如何设置 和 属性以及如何使用 方法。It also demonstrates setting the and properties and using the method. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到导入 命名空间和命名空间的空窗体中 。To run this example, paste it in an empty form that imports the namespace and the namespace. `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用。Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. summary.span: 获取或设置 中当前选定项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item in a .

value.span: 当前选定项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.

value.span: 如果未选定任何项，则返回值为负一 (-1)。

span.span: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于标准 ，你可以使用此属性来确定在中选择的项的索引 。For a standard , you can use this property to determine the index of the item that is selected in the . 如果将 的属性 设置为 `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` 或 `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (指示多选 ) 并且在列表中选择了多个项，则此属性可以将索引返回到任何选定项。If the property of the is set to either `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (which indicates a multiple-selection ) and multiple items are selected in the list, this property can return the index to any selected item. 若要检索包含多重选择中所有选定项的索引的集合 ，请使用 属性。To retrieve a collection containing the indexes of all selected items in a multiple-selection , use the property. 如果要获取中当前选定的项 ，请使用 属性。If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the , use the property. 此外，还可以使用 属性来获取多选内容中的所有选定项 。In addition, you can use the property to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与属性结合使用， 以将当前选定的项移动到的显示区域中项列表的顶部 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 该示例还演示了如何使用类的方法删除项 ，以及如何使用方法清除所有项选择 。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 代码首先将中的当前选定项移动 到列表的顶部。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 然后，该代码移除当前选定项之前的所有项，并清除中的所有选择 。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 此示例要求将 包含项添加到窗体中，并且当前在中选择了某个项 。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the . MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedIndexChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 在 属性或 集合更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property or the collection has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以为此事件创建事件处理程序，以确定中的选定索引何时 发生更改。You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the selected index in the has been changed. 当你需要基于中的当前选定内容在其他控件中显示信息时，这会很有用 。This can be useful when you need to display information in other controls based on the current selection in the . 您可以使用此事件的事件处理程序将信息加载到其他控件中。You can use the event handler for this event to load the information in the other controls. 如果将 属性设置为 或 ，则对集合所做的任何更改 （包括从选定内容中删除项）都将引发此事件。If the property is set to or , any change to the collection, including removing an item from the selection, will raise this event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件在不同控件中搜索和选择项 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to search for and select an item in a different control. 该示例使用 事件确定中的选定项发生更改的时间 。The example uses the event to determine when the selected item in the is changed. 然后，示例代码使用属性读取项的文本 ，并 使用 第一个中返回的文本在另一个上调用方法 。The example code then reads the text of the item using the property and calls the method on a different using the text returned by in the first . 如果在其他项中找到项 ，则选择该项。If an item is found in the other , the item is selected. 此示例要求 在窗体中添加了两个名为和的控件， `listBox1` `listBox2` 并且这两个控件都 包含完全相同的项。This example requires that two controls, named `listBox1` and `listBox2`, have been added to a form and that both controls contain items that are identical. 该示例还要求在示例中定义的事件处理方法已连接到的 事件 `listBox1` 。The example also requires that the event-handling method defined in the example is connected to the event of `listBox1`. [!code-cpp[ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于多重选择 ，此属性返回一个集合，其中包含中选定的所有项的索引 。For a multiple-selection , this property returns a collection containing the indexes to all items that are selected in the . 对于单项选择 ，此属性返回一个集合，其中包含单个元素，该元素包含中唯一选定项的索引 。For a single-selection , this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the index of the only selected item in the . 有关如何操作集合项的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about how to manipulate the items of the collection, see . 类提供了许多方法来引用所选的项。The class provides a number of ways to reference selected items. 您可以使用属性，而不是使用属性获取选定项中当前选定项的索引位置 。Instead of using the property to obtain the index position of the currently selected item in a single-selection , you can use the property. 如果要获取中当前选定的项 ，而不是项的索引位置，请使用 属性。If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the , instead of the index position of the item, use the property. 此外， 如果想要获取多选内容中的所有选定项，则可使用属性 。In addition, you can use the property if you want to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法在的项中搜索搜索文本的所有实例 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to search for all instances of the search text in the items of the . 该示例使用方法的版本，通过该版本可以 指定起始搜索索引，以便对中的所有项进行持续搜索 。The example uses the version of the method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the . 该示例还演示了如何确定方法在 到达项列表的底部后从列表顶部开始搜索，以防止递归搜索。The example also demonstrates how to determine when the method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items to prevent a recursive search. 在中找到项后 ，使用方法选择这些项 。Once items are found in the , they are selected using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于标准 ，你可以使用此属性来确定在中选择了哪一项 。For a standard , you can use this property to determine which item is selected in the . 如果将 的属性 设置为 `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` 或 `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (指示多选 ) 并且在列表中选择了多个项，则此属性可以返回任何选定项。If the property of the is set to either `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (which indicates a multiple-selection ) and multiple items are selected in the list, this property can return any selected item. 若要检索包含多重选择中所有选定项的集合 ，请使用 属性。To retrieve a collection containing all selected items in a multiple-selection , use the property. 如果要获取中当前选定项的索引位置 ，请使用 属性。If you want to obtain the index position of the currently selected item in the , use the property. 此外，还可以使用 属性来获取多选内容中的所有选定索引 。In addition, you can use the property to obtain all the selected indexes in a multiple-selection . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件在不同控件中搜索和选择项 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to search for and select an item in a different control. 该示例使用 事件确定中的选定项发生更改的时间 。The example uses the event to determine when the selected item in the is changed. 然后，示例代码使用属性读取项的文本 ，并 使用 第一个中返回的文本在另一个上调用方法 。The example code then reads the text of the item using the property and calls the method on a different using the text returned by in the first . 如果在其他项中找到项 ，则选择该项。If an item is found in the other , the item is selected. 此示例要求 在窗体中添加了两个名为和的控件， `listBox1` `listBox2` 并且这两个控件都 包含完全相同的项。This example requires that two controls, named `listBox1` and `listBox2`, have been added to a form and that both controls contain items that are identical. 该示例还要求在示例中定义的事件处理方法已连接到的 事件 `listBox1` 。The example also requires that the event-handling method defined in the example is connected to the event of `listBox1`. [!code-cpp[ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于多重选择 ，此属性返回一个集合，其中包含中选定的所有项 。For a multiple-selection , this property returns a collection containing all items that are selected in the . 对于单项选择 ，此属性返回一个集合，其中包含单个元素，该元素包含中的唯一选定项 。For a single-selection , this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the only selected item in the . 有关如何操作集合项的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about how to manipulate the items of the collection, see . 类提供了许多方法来引用所选的项。The class provides a number of ways to reference selected items. 您可以使用属性，而不是使用属性获取选定内容中的当前选定项 。Instead of using the property to obtain the currently selected item in a single-selection , you can use the property. 如果要获取中当前选定项的索引位置 ，而不是项本身，则使用 属性。If you want to obtain the index position of an item that is currently selected in the , instead of the item itself, use the property. 此外， 如果想要获取多选内容中所有选定项的索引位置，则可以使用属性 。In addition, you can use the property if you want to obtain the index positions of all selected items in a multiple-selection .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以确定 用户一次可以选择多少项以及用户如何进行多项选择。The property enables you to determine how many items in the a user can select at one time and how the user can make multiple-selections. 当 属性设置为时 `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` ，按下 shift 键，然后单击鼠标或按 shift 键和箭头键之一 (向上键、向下键、向左键和向右键) 将选定项从之前选择的项扩展到当前项。When the property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, pressing SHIFT and clicking the mouse or pressing SHIFT and one of the arrow keys (UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW) extends the selection from the previously selected item to the current item. 按下 CTRL 键并单击鼠标即可选择或取消选择列表中的项。Pressing CTRL and clicking the mouse selects or deselects an item in the list. 当属性设置为时 `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` ，鼠标单击或按空格键会选择或取消选择列表中的项。When the property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple`, a mouse click or pressing the SPACEBAR selects or deselects an item in the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来确定在中选择了哪些项以便 选择未选择的项并取消选择所选的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to determine which items in a are selected in order to select the items that are not selected and deselect the items that are selected. 该示例还演示了如何使用 属性使 具有多个选定项，并使用 属性来演示如何自动对中的项进行排序 。The example also demonstrates using the property to enable a to have more than one selected item and uses the property to demonstrate how to sort items in a automatically. 此示例需要一个名为的，并将其 `listBox1` 添加到窗体中，并 `InitializeMyListBox` 从该窗体的事件中调用此示例中定义的方法 。This example requires that a , named `listBox1`, has been added to a form and that the `InitializeMyListBox` method defined in the example is called from the event of the form. [!code-cpp[ListBox.GetSelected#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.GetSelected/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.GetSelected#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.GetSelected/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.GetSelected#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.GetSelected/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的高度 按属性的倍数增加和减少 。The height of the control increases and decreases by a multiple of the property. 如果 height 为的数字不是的倍数 ，则的高度 将由小于高度的最大倍数更改。If height is a number that is not a multiple of , the height of the will change by the largest multiple that is less than height. 通常，与指定参数中未包含的边界对应的参数将与当前值一起传入。Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the specified parameter are passed in with their current values. 例如， `height` `width` 可以将属性的、或 `x` 属性 `y` 与控件的当前实例的引用一起传入。For example, the `height`, `width`, or the `x` or `y` properties of the property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control. 但是，传入的所有值都将生效并应用于控件。However, all values passed in are honored and applied to the control. `specified`参数表示 由您的应用程序更改的控件的元素。The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls changed by your application. 例如，如果更改 控件的，则 `specified` 参数值为 。For example, if you change the of the control, the `specified` parameter value is . 但是，如果 在响应所设置的属性时调整 ，则 `specified` 参数值为 。However, if the is adjusted in response to the property being set, the `specified` parameter value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性自动对中的字符串进行排序 。Use the property to automatically sort strings alphabetically in a . 将项添加到排序后 ，项将移动到排序列表中的相应位置。As items are added to a sorted , the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list. 向添加项时 ，首先排序项并添加新项会更有效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 如果将其 设置为，则 `true` 不应使用属性绑定到数据 。A with its set to `true` should not be bound to data using the property. 若要在绑定中显示已排序 的数据，应绑定到支持排序的数据源，并使数据源提供排序。To display sorted data in a bound , you should bind to a data source that supports sorting and have the data source provide the sorting. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来确定在中选择了哪些项以便 选择未选择的项并取消选择所选的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to determine which items in a are selected in order to select the items that are not selected and deselect the items that are selected. 该示例还演示了如何使用 属性使 具有多个选定项，并使用 属性来演示如何自动对中的项进行排序 。The example also demonstrates using the property to enable a to have more than one selected item and uses the property to demonstrate how to sort items in a automatically. 此示例需要一个名为的，并将其 `listBox1` 添加到窗体中，并 `InitializeMyListBox` 从该窗体的事件中调用此示例中定义的方法 。This example requires that a , named `listBox1`, has been added to a form and that the `InitializeMyListBox` method defined in the example is called from the event of the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初，索引位置为零 (0) 的项位于可见区域的顶部 。Initially, the item with the index position zero (0) is at the top of the visible region of the . 如果的内容已 滚动，则另一项可能位于控件的显示区域的顶部。If the contents of the have been scrolled, another item might be at the top of the control's display area. 您可以使用此属性来获取中的项的索引，该索引 当前位于控件可见区域的顶部。You can use this property to obtain the index within the for the of the item that is currently positioned at the top of the visible region of the control. 还可以使用此属性将列表中的项定位到控件的可见区域的顶部。You can also use this property to position an item in the list at the top of the visible region of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与属性结合使用， 以将当前选定的项移动到的显示区域中项列表的顶部 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 该示例还演示了如何使用类的方法删除项 ，以及如何使用方法清除所有项选择 。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 代码首先将中的当前选定项移动 到列表的顶部。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 然后，该代码移除当前选定项之前的所有项，并清除中的所有选择 。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 此示例要求将 包含项添加到窗体中，并且当前在中选择了某个项 。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the .
